mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id AS userId, type, message, created_at AS createdAt, is_read AS isRead FROM bg_alarm WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bg_alarm (user_id, type, message, is_read, created_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{type}, #{message}, 0, NOW())
